name: 陳文斌
objective: 藉由本課程了解工程力學中靜力學之各項定理，並以常見之結構問題為例，實際應用各定理。本課程包含: 簡介、向量運算、力、力矩、平衡方程式、等效力系、結構應用、形心及質心、平面區域之慣性特性。
schedule:
W1. General principles
W2-W3. Force vectors
W4-W5. Equilibrium of a particle
W6-W7. Force system resultants
W8-W9. Equilibrium of a rigid body
W10. Midterm exam
W11-W12. Structural analysis
W13-W14. Internal forces
W15. Friction
W16. Center of gravity and centroid
W17. Moments of inertia
W18. Final exam
materials:
教科書: Engineering Mechanics, Statics. 12th Edition, By R. C. Hibbeler 
Prentice Hall
